fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Culture and media, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Single market, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
EU policies and legislative proposals on: 
- Nutrition and health 
- Food safety and food quality 
- Food labelling 
- Functioning of the Food Chain 
- Contaminants in food 
- Waste, litter, packaging waste, food waste 
- Sustainability of the Food Chain 
- Franchising 
- Emoloyment and training 
- Advertising and marketing 
- Fees on card-based payments
organisation_name: Serving Europe - Branded Food and Beverage Service Chains Association
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: European Platform for Action on Diet, Physical Activity and Health#E00845#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=845#Member#C
goals__remit: The aim of Serving Europe is to promote the understanding of the restaurant and coffee shop chain sector through an enhanced dialogue with policy makers and opinion leaders at a European level on matters affecting the modern restaurant sector (i.e. branded, multi-unit, convenience, quality, food and beverage operators).
relevant_communication:
- Development of a Code of Practice to minimise the presence of acrylamide in french fries and buns (2016) 
- Viewpoint on "Franchising in the Branded Food & Beverage Service Chain Sector" (2017)
